comment1: Use $Name where Name is one among semantics.json names (not codes), replace any white space with _ : e.g. $Import_Export $School_type $Nationality.
comment2: Never start a question with $Name (whatever Name is) as first word
comment3: Always add a white space after $Name even before the last ?
comment4: Use $EXPR for expressions like min, max, avg. Use / to separate singular/plural
comment5: Use _ to create attribute groups, attaching words to an attribute $Name: e.g. for_all_$Gender_students in_$City, with_a_$Degree_degree. If $Name is not generated, the attached terms are not generated too
comment6: Use __ to attach attribute groups together to maintain their order and contiguity: e.g. for_all_$Nationality_$Gender_students, of_$Type_of_pollution_pollution__of_$polluted_element__in_$Year. If $Name is not generated, the corresponding group (separated by __) is not generated too
comment7: Use ((name)) to add that name in that place when it usually comes into an attribute group but will not appear because this attribute is not generated: e.g.: of_((students)) of_$Gender_students --> if no gender is generated: What is the number of students in...
